long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is it interesting to get information about covid development around the world?

Look at information about spread of Covid and search.

Install this extension and you will have a wonderful tool from Johns Hopkins University for planning safe trips. 

How to use CovidDash:

Click on extension's icon.
Get CovidDash on the new tab.
This information is for all countries.
Also you can use our search bar and get to know

...Is there a Covid on Mars?


By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the CovidDash Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab and default search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
